CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT( Traffic_Light__c ) , "Grey", IMAGE("/img/colHeader_bg.gif", "Grey",25,25) , "Red", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif", "Red",25,25) , "Green", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "Green",25,25) , "Amber", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "Amber",25,25) , "")
CustomField.label: Traffic Color
